title: Mario Badescu Drying Lotion - 1 oz
description: Our best selling product, Mario Badescu's Drying Lotion is an excellent spot treatment made with a blend of Calamine and Salicylic Acid to clear up and soothe unsightly whiteheads overnight. A dab of this lotion will heal and dry pimples quickl

title: Buffering Lotion
description: Specifically designed to treat large, deep, cystic acne, the buffering lotion covers large erupted areas for overall treatment. Formulated with nourishing B vitamins and amino acids for healthy skin as well as soothing anti-inflammatory herbal extracts to promote healing. Reduce cystic acne fast with this deep penetrating, fast absorbing formula.

title: St. Ives, Sensitive Skin Apricot Scrub, 6-Ounce (Pack of 6)
Almay Moisturizing Eye Makeup Remover Liquid, 4 Fluid Ounce
description: Nourishing liquid remover boasts a botanical blend of aloe, cucumber and green tea to condition and hydrate skin.

title: Amber Buxom Big & Healthy Lip Polish from Bare Escentuals
description: A Buxom babe is all about curves, tingles and attitude - and that includes the lips. Plump what you've got with our luscious polish, which naturally creates the look of fuller, more voluptuous lips. You'll know it's working when a tingly, cooling sensation rushes over you.

title: Alterna Caviar Anti-Aging Moisture Shampoo with Seasilk, 33.83-Ounce Bottle
description: Alterna Caviar Hair Care. It has long been recognized that as we age, hair loses vital nutrients, causing it to become dull and brittle. One of the most important nutrients lost is the omega-3 fatty acid. Once again, in order to find a way to boost the hair's intake of a crucial nutrient (in this case, omega-3), Alterna has uncovered the richest provider of omega-3 and a perfect complement to Alterna's enzymetherapy® complex - caviar. Caviar is known to provide significant levels of this life-sustaining source and is rich in proteins, vitamins and minerals. Caviar also has a cell format that is similar to human skin, helping to improve the health of the scalp. By including a caviar extract in some of its formulations, Alterna is able to bring back soft, healthy-looking luster while protecting the hair from the effects of aging. By supplementing the hair with the richest source of omega-3 and the enzymes required to convert hair's essential building blocks into a useable form, hair can be revitalized from root to tip, returning it to a more youthful-looking appearance.

title: The One By Dolce & Gabbana For Women Eau De Parfum Spray 1.6 Oz
description: THE ONE by Dolce & Gabbana for Women EAU DE PARFUM SPRAY 1.6 OZ plum, vetiver bergamot, fruity floral, Madonna lily, muguet, lychee, jasmine, vanillaWhen applying any fragrance please consider that there are several factors which can affect the natural smell of your skin and, in turn, the way a scent smells on you.  For instance, your mood, stress level, age, body chemistry, diet, and current medications may all alter the scents you wear.  Similarly, factor such as dry or oily skin can even affect the amount of time a fragrance will last after being applied

title: Solia Professional Ceramic Ion Flat Iron (1-3/4")Solia
description: Solia's 1-3/4" model is designed for customers with thick, long hair (longer than shoulder length).

title: Remington S5500 Digital Anti Static 1 Inch Ceramic Hair Straightener
description: Say goodbye to frizz and fly-aways while boosting style control with remingtons s-5500 one inch digital heat ceramic flat iron. infused anti-static technology reduces the amount of negatively charged particles during styling and allows for 50% more static control. the thirty second instant heat up will reach the salon high heat temperature of 410 degrees fahrenheit. one hour automatic shut off, 2 limited year warranty, and floating plates.

title: Shikai, Borage Therapy, Eye Cream, 0.5-Ounces
description: ShiKai is a trusted brand of natural beauty products known for innovative, effective formulations that are gentle on hair and skin. Founded by two chemists in 1970 who experimented with the therapeutic benefits of botanicals. Our gentle formulations rely on effective botanical ingredients to nourish your hair and skin. Try our moisturizing shower gels (which double as bubble bath) to relieve dry skin all day -- now in nine luscious fragrances.

title: Wen by Chaz Dean Tea Tree Cleansing Conditioner 16 oz.
